# sg-info-field



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                    | Type                                                                                                     | Default                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `currencySymbol` | `currency-symbol` | Currency symbol for currency type                              | `string`                                                                                                 | `'€'`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| `emptyText`      | `empty-text`      | Placeholder text when value is empty                           | `string`                                                                                                 | `'No especificado'`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| `falseText`      | `false-text`      | Boolean text for false value                                   | `string`                                                                                                 | `'No'`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| `label`          | `label`           | Label text for the field                                       | `string`                                                                                                 | `''`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| `locale`         | `locale`          | Date format locale                                             | `string`                                                                                                 | `'es-ES'`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| `statusMap`      | --                | Custom status map for status type                              | `{ [x: string]: StatusMapItem; }`                                                                        | `{     active: { label: 'Activo', bgColor: '#dcfce7', textColor: '#166534' },     inactive: { label: 'Inactivo', bgColor: '#fee2e2', textColor: '#991b1b' },     pending: { label: 'Pendiente', bgColor: '#fef3c7', textColor: '#92400e' },     draft: { label: 'Borrador', bgColor: '#f3f4f6', textColor: '#374151' },     completed: { label: 'Completado', bgColor: '#dbeafe', textColor: '#1e40af' },     cancelled: { label: 'Cancelado', bgColor: '#fce7f3', textColor: '#9d174d' },   }` |
| `trueText`       | `true-text`       | Boolean text for true value                                    | `string`                                                                                                 | `'Sí'`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| `type`           | `type`            | Type of value formatting                                       | `"array" \| "boolean" \| "currency" \| "custom" \| "date" \| "datetime" \| "html" \| "status" \| "text"` | `'text'`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| `value`          | `value`           | Value to display (can be string, number, boolean, array, etc.) | `any`                                                                                                    | `undefined`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
